I wanna sleep so much but this filed is so damn interesting ! Hello! ¡Hola! Bonjour! Привет! こんにちは！ 你好！ 안녕하세요! مرحباً! नमस्ते! I’m Rajan Ghimire, a computer engineering graduate with a keen interest in implementing deep learning architectures and papers from scratch. My unique blend of theoretical knowledge and hands-on experience allows me to bridge the gap between academia and industry, crafting innovative solutions that push the boundaries of what’s possible.
